text: you know I'm always doing this I'll rush
off to the underground to catch a train
and then when I actually get here I
realize I've left my wallet behind and
then got any money to pay for my journey
well from today that's no longer a
problem in Moscow because now there's
another way to get your ticket and this
is how you do it I agree it's a little
unorthodox but I think I'll get it in
the end if I've got the part now as you
can see I'm trying to do squat in this
rather unusual Russian bending machine
and I've told that if I can do 30 squats
in two minutes
then this machine will actually reward
me with a free metro ticket that's worth
30 rubles now this invention is the
brainchild of the Russian Olympic
Committee and the whole idea is to
encourage a sporty lifestyle for
Russians ahead of the Sochi games now if
you think you can fool this invention
think again because there are special
sensors here and if it doesn't like any
of my squats perish the thought of
course then it won't count them so here
we go three two one oh there we go
I've done it I gotta get the ticket here
it comes yeah thank you very much my Z
was it worth it cuz I really haven't got
the energy now to get on that train
